title: 5.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Research about different animals and the intelligent traits they show. Discuss the intelligence level of each animal with other members of your group. Identify the top five intelligent animals and list down the reasons for choosing them.

testcases.value:

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
